column1: Website and/or Email must be included as populated columns in order to enrich your data. If neither column is included in your file, there will be no enriched data.
Feel free to include any additional fields/columns in the file.
The order of columns does not matter as long as columns are named properly.
Column headers must match below exactly.
Column headers must be the first row of the file, else there will be no enriched data.
